result.arabic_text: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تَكۡفُرُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱللَّهُ شَهِيدٌ عَلَىٰ مَا تَعۡمَلُونَ
result.translation: 98. Nabiyow keenik ixxic:kitab maraw (yahuud kee Nasaara kinnuk) Yallih Aayootay (Qhuraan kinnuk) Nabii Mucammadal ﷺ obtey Yallih diini islaam diini kinnim tascassee macah tangaddeenii? Isin Aaxaguk, Yalli isin Abba haytaanam yabali kinni.
